title: Installing Go - web page instructions missing information
body:
by **DamnedYankee**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.Read the web page http://golang.org/doc/install.html
2.Note that the section entitled "Fetch the repository" does not discuss
the installation of python easy_install or python-dev package required to
install mercurial
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Add instructions for installation of easy_install and mention the
python-dev package requirement

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?  N/A


Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)  N/A


Please provide any additional information below.
Instructions for Ubuntu for installing easy_install and python-dev 
easy_install is provided by 
     sudo apt-get install python-setuptools
python-dev is provided by
     sudo apt-get install python-dev
